docs.text: Welcome to Xiaodong Yang's Lab For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . EDUCATION BACKGROUND: 2005-2009 B.A. in Horticulture, College of Horticulture, Shenyang Agriculture University, China. 2009-2014 Ph.D. in Olericulture, College of Agriculture and Biotechnology, Zhejiang University, China. 2012-2014 Visiting Scholar, Center for plant science innovation, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, NE, U.S.A 2015-2017 Post-doctoral researcher, Department of Agronomy, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, NE, U.S.A 2017-present: Assistant Research Professor, Department of Biology, The Pennsylvania State University, PA, U.S.A google scholar
